segments.text: Everything in that minibar has been consumed , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything special you'd like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just bring me three bottles each of Jim Beam and Perrier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , sir . Three of each . Would you like anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The fruit basket was great . I need a few more apples , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perrier , Jim Beam , and apples . Is that it for now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your order will be brought to you momentarily , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
